Functions
cpintc_test.c File Reference

This is the Example test code for the CPINTC Functional layer. The code also utilizes the INTC CSL functional layer to determine that routing of system interrupts to the GEM cores is done properly. More...

#include <stdio.h>
#include <ti/csl/src/intc/csl_intc.h>
#include <ti/csl/tistdtypes.h>
#include <ti/csl/csl_cpIntcAux.h>

Functions

void main (void)
 

Detailed Description

This is the Example test code for the CPINTC Functional layer. The code also utilizes the INTC CSL functional layer to determine that routing of system interrupts to the GEM cores is done properly.

Function Documentation

static Int32 test_disable_all_host_interrupt ( void  )
static

Description
This test case does the following:-

  • Enables System Interrupt 3
  • Disables all Host Interrupts
  • Enables Host Interrupt 3
  • Generates system interrupts 3 Test Case passes if the ISR has not been invoked else the test fails.
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
static Int32 test_disable_host_interrupt ( void  )
static

Description
This test case does the following:-

  • Enables System Interrupt 3
  • Enables all Host Interrupts
  • Disables Host Interrupt 3
  • Generates system interrupts 3 Test Case passes if the ISR has not been invoked else the test fails.
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
static Int32 test_disable_sys_interrupt ( void  )
static

Description
This test case does the following:-

  • Disables System Interrupt 3
  • Enables all Host Interrupts
  • Generates system interrupts 3 Test Case passes if the ISR has not been invoked else the test fails.
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
static void test_isr_handler ( void *  handle)
static

Description
This is the TEST ISR Handler which has been installed. This simply increments a global variable which counts the number of interrupts which have been received.

Return values
NotApplicable.
static Int32 test_spurious_sys_interrupt ( void  )
static

Description
This test case does the following:-

  • Enables System Interrupt 3
  • Enables all Host Interrupts
  • Enables Host Interrupt 3
  • Generates system interrupts 4 Test Case passes if the ISR has not been invoked else the test fails.
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
static Int32 test_working_sys_interrupts ( void  )
static

Description
This test case does the following:-

  • Enables System Interrupt 3
  • Enable all Host Interrupts
  • Generates 20 system interrupts. Test Case passes if all 20 system interrupts were detected else the test case fails.
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
